snippet: Although investors are counting on bold action when the European Central Bank meets on Thursday, analysts say Mario Draghi, the bank's president, could have a far harder time reconciling the expectations of twitchy financial markets with the...
abstract: Although investors are counting on bold action when the European Central Bank meets on Thursday, analysts say Mario Draghi, the bank's president, could have a far harder time reconciling the expectations of twitchy financial markets with the limitations of his power.

headline.main: A Pivotal Week for Europe's Central Bank Leader
